data.title: Eyemart Express
data.meta_description: Eyemart Express | 7,442 followers on LinkedIn. We improve lives by helping people see better. | Eyemart Express was doctor-founded in 1990 with a clear objective – to provide people with affordable, quality eyewear and same-day speed. We operate nationwide with a family of brands that include Eyewear Express, Vision4Less, and Visionmart Express. We partner with great optometrists and optical experts and our continuous innovation and investments in technology has led us to grow quickly across the country.
data.text:
Congratulations to Qandeel on her promotion to General Manager at our Hillard, OH, location! Her hard work and commitment have truly paid off, and we are excited to see the amazing contributions she will bring in her new role. Join us in celebrating Qandeel's success and wishing her all the best as she takes on this exciting new challenge! #EyemartExpress #Optical #CustomerService #EmployeeAppreciation #EyemartTeam #CareerGrowth

At Eyemart Express, we improve people's lives by helping them see better. Shoutout to John, our amazing lab manager in Florence, SC, for helping a local firefighter with specialized lenses for his mask! His dedication to supporting first responders in the community is inspiring. Great work, John! #EyemartExpress #Optical #CustomerService #EmployeeAppreciation #EyemartTeam

When we promise glasses in a blink, we deliver on that promise! A thoughtful customer treated our Manitowoc, WI, team to Starbucks for going above and beyond. The team was able to retrieve her prescription from her doctor and made her new glasses in no time. Great job, team! #EyemartExpress #Optical #CustomerService #EmployeeAppreciation #EyemartTeam

Today, we want to recognize Kaleigh at our Spokane Valley, WA, store as the winner of our Spectacular Specs Award! She and her team successfully made bi-concave lenses to help a customer with a high prescription see clearly. Join us in thanking Kaleigh and the Spokane Valley team for their dedication to providing quality eyewear solutions for our valued customers. Here's to many more successes and innovations ahead! #EyemartExpress #Optical #CustomerService #EmployeeAppreciation #EyemartTeam

Our store in Fishers, IN, recently hosted a lemonade stand to support Isaiah 117 House, a nonprofit that helps children who are removed from their homes due to safety concerns. The organization provides a comforting space where they can feel safe, with caring volunteers offering clean clothes, toys, and cozy blankets. We’re proud to support this important cause and grateful for everyone who enjoyed lemonade while waiting for their new glasses! #EyemartExpress #Optical #CustomerService #EmployeeAppreciation #EyemartTeam #CommunityOutreach #GivingBack

As the exclusive eye care partner of the Veterans of Foreign Wars (VFW), we deeply value the dedication and sacrifices made by our veterans and active-duty military personnel. Recently, our Rock Hill team had an amazing time connecting with some of our nation's heroes, and most importantly, express our gratitude, at the organization's South Carolina convention! #EyemartExpress #Optical #CustomerService #EmployeeAppreciation #EyemartTeam #VFWConvention #CommunityEngagement

Join us in celebrating a significant milestone as our Rapid City location marks its 15th anniversary! This team has shown unwavering dedication, exceptional service, and a strong commitment to our community over the years. We are incredibly proud of their achievements and look forward to many more years of success. #EyemartExpress #TeamWork #Optical #CustomerService #EmployeeAppreciation #EyemartTeam

Congratulations to District Manager Wanda Davis on receiving the Mentor Award in Vision Monday Magazine's 2024 Most Influential Women In Optical. Wanda’s dedication to mentoring her team and sharing her extensive knowledge has been invaluable. She excels in guiding her team, fostering growth, and driving success across her district. Join us in celebrating Wanda’s achievement! bit.ly/VisionMondayMIW2024 #EyemartExpress #Innovator #VisionMonday #Optical #WomenInOptical

We are thrilled to announce that our VP of Brand & Creative, Lisette Sacks, has received the Innovator Award in Vision Monday Magazine's 2024 Most Influential Women in Optical! Join us in congratulating Lisette on this well-deserved honor! #EyemartExpress #Innovator #VisionMonday #Optical #WomenInOptical

Today's store highlight goes out to the exceptional efforts of our Odessa team and General Manager Nelda. When a local nursing home faced difficulties in securing prescription glasses for their residents, Nelda and her team stepped in to provide measurements and fittings directly on the nursing home's bus. Their dedication to community service and their proactive approach to helping people see clearly exemplify our commitment to making a positive impact in the communities that we serve. Thank you for your outstanding work, Odessa store team! #EyemartExpress #TeamWork #Optical #CustomerService #EmployeeAppreciation #EyemartTeam
